CustomTkinter.name: customtkinter
CustomTkinter.full_desc: CustomTkinter is a python UI-library based on Tkinter, which provides new, modern and fully customizable widgets. They are created and used like normal Tkinter widgets and can also be used in combination with normal Tkinter elements. The widgets and the window colors either adapt to the system appearance or the manually set mode ('light', 'dark'), and all CustomTkinter widgets and windows support HighDPI scaling (Windows, macOS). With CustomTkinter you'll get a consistent and modern look across all desktop platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux).
CustomTkinter.author: TomSchimansky

CTkMessagebox.name: ctkmessagebox
CTkMessagebox.full_desc: A modern and fully customizable messagebox for customtkinter.
CTkMessagebox.author: Akascape
highlights: Add multiple options according to your wish
Spawns at center of the screen/app
No ugly looking header or borders

CTkColorPicker.name: ctkcolorpicker
CTkColorPicker.full_desc: A modern color picker made for customtkinter!
CTkColorPicker.author: Akascape

CTkTable.name: ctktable
CTkTable.full_desc: A quick and simple table widget having all the basic features.
CTkTable.author: Akascape

CTkTooltip.name: ctktooltip
CTkTooltip.full_desc: Small tooltip pop-up label for displaying details on customtkinter widgets.
CTkTooltip.author: Akascape

CTkScrollableDropdown.name: ctkscrollabledropdown
CTkScrollableDropdown.desc: DropdownMenu widget for combobox and optionmenus
CTkScrollableDropdown.full_desc: Replace the old looking tkMenu and add this new scrollable dropdown menu to customtkinter optionmenu, combobox, entries, buttons etc...
CTkScrollableDropdown.author: Akascape
highlights: Define custom height for the menu

CTkRangeSlider.name: ctkrangeslider
CTkRangeSlider.full_desc: A range slider widget made for customtkinter.
CTkRangeSlider.author: Akascape

CTkMenuBar.name: ctkmenubar
CTkMenuBar.full_desc: Modern menu bar widget library for customtkinter.
CTkMenuBar.author: Akascape

CTkPopupKeyboard.name: ctkpopupkeyboard
CTkPopupKeyboard.full_desc: On-Screen Keyboard/Numpad widget for customtkinter entries and textbox.
CTkPopupKeyboard.author: Akascape

TkDial.name: tkdial
TkDial.full_desc: This is a library containing some circular rotatory dial-knob widgets for Tkinter. It can be used in place of normal sliders and scale.
TkDial.author: Akascape

TkNodeSystem.name: tknodesystem
TkNodeSystem.full_desc:
TkNodeSystem is a nodal-interface, basically a DAG where each node performs an operation on it's input connections, and outputs something (which you can connect to another node). 
It can be used to implement flow-based operations in your application. It can be used with tkinter or customtkinter easily as it is created with tkinter canvas.
TkNodeSystem.author: Akascape

CTkThemeMaker.name: ctkthememaker
CTkThemeMaker.full_desc: A quick and easy theme builder for customtkinter!
CTkThemeMaker.author: Akascape

CTkDesigner.name: ctkdesigner
CTkDesigner.full_desc: No code window designer for customtkinter, just drag and drop and save your time.
CTkDesigner.author: Akascape
highlights: All required functionalities and shortcuts added

CTkThemeBuilder.name: ctkthemebuilder
CTkThemeBuilder.full_desc: CTk Theme Builder provides a WYSIWYG interface for creating and maintaining CustomTkinter themes.
CTkThemeBuilder.author: Clive Bostock
highlights: See live preview of the theme

TkVideoPlayer.name: tkvideoplayer
TkVideoPlayer.full_desc: This is a simple library to play video files in tkinter. This library also provides the ability to play, pause, skip and seek to specific timestamps.
TkVideoPlayer.author: PaulleDemon

CTkDataVisualizingWidgets.name: ctkdatavisualizingwidgets
CTkDataVisualizingWidgets.desc: Custom calendar, graph and chart widgets
CTkDataVisualizingWidgets.full_desc: A library focused on displaying data related operations.
CTkDataVisualizingWidgets.author: ZikPin

CTkRadarChart.name: ctkradarchart
CTkRadarChart.full_desc: A radar chart widget for customtkinter, data visualizing widget.
CTkRadarChart.author: Akascape
highlights: Visualise data in a radar chart

CTkPieChart.name: ctkpiechart
CTkPieChart.full_desc: A pie chart widget for customtkinter, data visualizing widget.
CTkPieChart.author: Akascape
highlights: Visualise data in a pie chart

TkCalendar.name: tkcalendar
TkCalendar.full_desc: tkcalendar is a python module that provides the Calendar and DateEntry widgets for Tkinter. The DateEntry widget is similar to a Combobox, but the drop-down is not a list but a Calendar to select a date. Events can be displayed in the Calendar with custom colors and a tooltip displays the event list for a given day. tkcalendar is compatible with both Python 2 and Python 3. It supports many locale settings (e.g. 'fr_FR', 'en_US', ..) and the colors are customizable.
TkCalendar.author: Juliette Monsel

ttkwidgets.name: ttkwidgets
ttkwidgets.full_desc: A collection of widgets for Tkinter's ttk extensions by various authors.
ttkwidgets.author: The TkinterEP team

ttkthemes.name: ttkthemes
ttkthemes.full_desc: A group of themes for the ttk extenstions for Tkinter gathered together by @RedFantom and created by various authors.
ttkthemes.author: The TkinterEP team

TkTerm.name: tkterm
TkTerm.full_desc:
A fully functional terminal emulator built on Tkinter library - perform all basic commands of a terminal. 
The Terminal is implemented as a Frame widget and can easily be integrated to other Tkinter application.
TkTerm.author: Dhanoo Surasarang
highlights: All terminal commands can be passed

TkTerminal.name: tkterminal
TkTerminal.full_desc: This library gives Terminal widget support to the Tkinter library. Perform almost all the operations of a terminal with tkterminal.
TkTerminal.author: Saad Mairaj
highlights: All terminal commands can be passed
Enable line number bar for the terminal

Auto-py-to-exe.name: auto-py-to-exe
Auto-py-to-exe.full_desc: A .py to .exe converter using a simple graphical interface and PyInstaller in Python.
Auto-py-to-exe.author: Brent Vollebregt
highlights: Convert your python script to exe

TkMacosx.name: tkmacosx
TkMacosx.full_desc:
This module provides some modified widgets of Tkinter which fixes many issues with widgets not working properly on macOS platform. For example Button of tkmacosx which looks and feels exactly like a native Tkinter button can change its background and foreground color and has a lot more functionality, Issues with Radiobutton are also fixed with this library. The library also offers some more useful widgets functionality. 
Note that these widgets are also supported in other platforms.
TkMacosx.author: Saad Mairaj

Chlorophyll.name: chlorophyll
Chlorophyll.full_desc: Chlorophyll provides the CodeView widget for tkinter, which is a Text widget with syntax highlighting, line numbers, and works as a simple code editor. It is written in Python and uses the pygments library for syntax highlighting and the TkLineNums module for line numbers.
Chlorophyll.author: rdbende
highlights: syntax highlights based on the coding language

TkLineNums.name: tklinenums
TkLineNums.full_desc: TkLineNums is a simple line numbering widget for Python's tkinter GUI library. It is directly connects to a Text widget and even supports ttk themes through the set_to_ttk_style method.
TkLineNums.author: Moosems
highlights: Clicking on line numbers will set the insert to the beginning of the line.
Shift clicking will select all text from the end of the line clicked by cursor and the insert position.
Can handle elided lines (elided lines are lines that are not visible in the text widget).
Supports ttk themes and allows easy color customization.

CTkCodeBox.name: ctkcodebox
CTkCodeBox.full_desc: Advanced Code Viewer for customtkinter, with line numbers and code highlighting.
CTkCodeBox.author: Akascape

TkSheet.name: tksheet
TkSheet.full_desc: tksheet is a Python tkinter table widget written in pure python. It works using tkinter canvases and moves lines, text and rectangles around for only the visible portion of the table
TkSheet.author: ragardner
highlights: Runs smoothly even with millions of rows/columns
Drag and drop columns and rows
Change any colors in the sheet
Create an unlimited number of high performance dropdown and check boxes

TkDnD2.name: tkinterdnd2
TkDnD2.full_desc: tkDnD2 is a tcl/Tk extension adding native drag and drop support.
TkDnD2.author: Philippe Gagne
highlights: Tkinter native drag and drop support for windows, unix and Mac OSX.

TkSliderWidget.name: tksliderwidget
TkSliderWidget.full_desc: Implementation of a slider widget using tkinter, multiple slider supported.
TkSliderWidget.author: MengxLi

AnimatedGif.name: animatedgif
AnimatedGif.full_desc: A very simple class (subclass of tkinter.Label) that displays an animated GIF in a label and either runs the animation in a separate thread or using tkinter's after() method.
AnimatedGif.author: OJ Skjelten

PyGUI-Gauge.name: pyguigauge
PyGUI-Gauge.full_desc: The Gauge Widget is a customizable graphical representation of a gauge, implemented using the Tkinter library in Python. It allows you to create visually appealing gauges with customizable parameters such as size, range, colors, and more.
PyGUI-Gauge.author: Dongli Liu
highlights: Customizable: The gauge has high flexibility
Interactive: Update the gauge value dynamically
Adjust the size, range, colors, and other parameterst

TkCurve.name: tkcurve
TkCurve.full_desc: A simple curve line widget for tkinter.
TkCurve.author: Akascape

AwesomeTkinter.name: awesometkinter
AwesomeTkinter.full_desc: AwesomeTkinter offers some pretty tkinter widgets. These widgets are just a tkinter widgets with custom styles and images.
AwesomeTkinter.author: Aboghazala

TkFileBrowser.name: tkfilebrowser
TkFileBrowser.full_desc: tkfilebrowser is an alternative to tkinter.filedialog that allows the user to select files or directories. The GUI is written with tkinter but the look is closer to GTK and the application uses GTK bookmarks (the one displayed in nautilus or thunar for instance). This filebrowser supports new directory creation and filtype filtering.
TkFileBrowser.author: Juliette Monsel

CTkPDFViewer.name: ctkpdfviewer
CTkPDFViewer.full_desc:
A simple yet powerfull pdf viewer widget for customtkinter! This can be helpful for adding documentation (in the form of PDF) inside your application. 
Users can quicky view the offline copy of your documenation.
CTkPDFViewer.author: Akascape

TkColorPicker.name: tkcolorpicker
TkColorPicker.full_desc: This module contains a ColorPicker class which implements the color picker and an askcolor function that displays the color picker and returns the chosen color in RGB and HTML formats.
TkColorPicker.author: Juliette Monsel

TkFontChooser.name: tkfontchooser
TkFontChooser.full_desc: This module contains a FontChooser class which implements the font chooser and an askfont function that displays the font chooser and returns the chosen font when the user closes the font chooser. The font is returned as a dictionary like the one returned by the function 'tkFont.Font.actual'.
TkFontChooser.author: Juliette Monsel

TkinterWeb.name: tkinterweb
TkinterWeb.full_desc:
TkinterWeb offers bindings for the Tkhtml3 widget, which enables loading HTML and CSS code into Tkinter applications. 
All major operating systems running Python 2.6+ or Python 3+ are supported.
TkinterWeb.author: Anderoo

TkinterMapView.name: tkintermapview
TkinterMapView.full_desc: TkinterMapView is a tile based interactive map renderer widget for the python Tkinter library. By default, it displays the OpenStreetMap map, but you can change the tile server to whatever you like, and it also supports a second tile server for overlays like OpenSeaMap. You can set the current focus of the widget by a position or address, and place markers or a path on the map.
TkinterMapView.author: TomSchimansky
highlights: Set position and zoom to fit bounding box

TkTimePicker.name: tkTimePicker
TkTimePicker.full_desc: This is a simple and fully customizable timepicker widgets made for tkinter. You can make use of three types of timepicker.
TkTimePicker.author: PaulleDemon

Sun-Valley-ttk-Theme.name: sv-ttk
Sun-Valley-ttk-Theme.full_desc: The sv_ttk package allows you to easily give a Windows 11 look and feel to your Tkinter/ttk app. Making applications with Tkinter, that look this gorgeous has never been possible before.
Sun-Valley-ttk-Theme.author: rdbende
highlights: Windows 11 look and feel for Tkinter

Sun Valley Theme Colorizer.name: sv_ttk_colorizer
Sun Valley Theme Colorizer.full_desc: A Python module for changing the accent color and applying some tweaks to @rdbende's Sun Valley ttk theme. Simple and easy to use.
Sun Valley Theme Colorizer.author: Valer100
highlights: change the accent color with no effort
apply tweaks and fixes, like dark mode titlebars support
export and import tweaks for future use

TkFontAwesome.name: tkfontawesome
TkFontAwesome.full_desc:
A library that enables you to use FontAwesome icons in your tkinter application. 
You may use any of the 1k+ free FontAwesome 5.0 icons. The fill color and size are customized to your specifications and then converted to an object via tksvg that can be used anywhere you would use a tkinter.PhotoImage object.
TkFontAwesome.author: Israel Dryer

TTkBootstrap.name: ttkbootstrap
TTkBootstrap.full_desc: A supercharged theme extension for tkinter that enables on-demand modern flat style themes inspired by Bootstrap.
TTkBootstrap.author: Israel Dryer

Py-Window-Styles.name: pywinstyles
Py-Window-Styles.full_desc:
Customize your tkinter window with awesome built-in windows header styles and themes. 
This is only for windows 11
Py-Window-Styles.author: Akascape

hPyT.name: hpyt
hPyT.full_desc: A package to manipulate windows and titlebar of GUI applications made using python Supports Both Windows 11 and 10
hPyT.author: Zingzy
highlights: Hide/Unhide both Maximize and Minimize Buttons (Completely Hides both buttons)
Center a window on the screen
Center a secondary window relative to the primary window
Other basic window management functions - Move, Resize, Maximize, Minimize, Restore
Circle, Vertical and Horizontal Motion Animations

CTkListbox.name: ctklistbox
CTkListbox.full_desc: A quick and modern listbox widget for customtkinter.
CTkListbox.author: Akascape
highlights: Similar to the tkinter listbox widget

TkVisualizer.name: tkvisualizer
TkVisualizer.full_desc: Simple audio visualizer widget for tkinter.
TkVisualizer.author: Akascape

CustomTkinterTitlebar.name: customtkintertitlebar
CustomTkinterTitlebar.full_desc: This is a project that can help you to get a custom titlebar. Different types of widgets can be added to the titlebar
CustomTkinterTitlebar.author: XiaoBaiYun
highlights: Different window themes: mica, fluent, blur

CTkXYFrame.name: ctkxyframe
CTkXYFrame.full_desc: A better scrollable frame for customtkinter with both x and y scrollability.
CTkXYFrame.author: Akascape
highlights: Both x and y scrollability at the same time
Dynamic scrollbars, hides automatically when reaches full size
Full customisability just like ctkscrollable frame

Tkinter Quick Layout.name: Tkinter_Quick_Layout
Tkinter Quick Layout.desc: Create complex grid layouts for reference
Tkinter Quick Layout.full_desc: This repository will help you create complex layouts when building Tkinter and CustomTkinter application
Tkinter Quick Layout.author: EasyDevv
highlights: Easily take reference while making any new layout

CTkMeter.name: CTkMeter
CTkMeter.full_desc: A cool and modern looking meter widget with hover animation for CustomTkinter library.
CTkMeter.author: Anand Krishnan
highlights: Easily add a circular progress bar widget

CTkClock.name: ctkclock
CTkClock.full_desc: A Library for CLock widget in Tkinter and CTkinter.
CTkClock.author: Arthur-101

Popup Menu.name: popup menu
Popup Menu.full_desc: A custom right click menu class for customtkinter.
Popup Menu.author: Akascape

Full Custom Window.name: customwindow
Full Custom Window.full_desc: A custom window class with new header style for windows 10/11 with rounded corners
Full Custom Window.author: Akascape

Tk-to-CTk.name: tkinter-to-customtkinter
Tk-to-CTk.full_desc: Convert your tkinter scripts and guis to custom tkinter with this command line tool. Comes with graphical user interface option and can determine programming paradigm and import structure to keep consistency across files
Tk-to-CTk.author: Donny

CTkComponents.name: CTkComponents
CTkComponents.full_desc: CTk Components is a collection of widgets and utilities designed as extensions or add-ons for customtkinter
CTkComponents.author: rudymohammadbali

Tkhtmlview.name: tkhtmlview
Tkhtmlview.author: bauripalash / paolo-gurisatti
highlights: text can be disaply as html

Libtextworker.name: libtextworker
Libtextworker.full_desc: This library aims to be suitable for both GUI and CLI/TUI based programs.
Libtextworker.author: Le Bao Nguyen
highlights: Tkinter text edit widget with line numbers
Directory tree + list (on work) with auto refresh
JSON+INI configuration system and class for anything you like

RoundedTk.name: RoundedTk
RoundedTk.full_desc: Rounded Tk is a Python library that allows you to easily create rounded windows and widgets with Python Tkinter.
RoundedTk.author: AZachia
highlights: Apply transparent round corners in the tkinter window

CTkSlideView.name: CTkSlideView
CTkSlideView.full_desc: A Slide View (Slideshow carousel) for customtkinter. This includes a smooth animation between the slides too.
CTkSlideView.author: rigvedmaanas

CTkCalendar.name: CTkCalendar
CTkCalendar.full_desc: CTkCalendar is a modern and customizable calendar widget built with Python's tkinter and customtkinter libraries. It provides a sleek, user-friendly interface to interact with calendar data, and it is perfect for adding calendar functionality to your Python applications.
CTkCalendar.author: Mustafa Hilmi YAVUZHAN
highlights: Aesthetic design with customizable colors and themes.
Month Navigation: Easily navigate between months with previous and next buttons.
Current Day Highlight: Highlight the current day with customizable colors.
Custom Callback: Execute a callback function when a day is clicked.
Flexible Display Options: Hide or show window elements based on preferences.

winaccent.name: winaccent
winaccent.full_desc: A simple and lightweight Python module for getting Windows' accent color or a shade of it. Works on both Windows 10 and 11 and doesn't require additional dependencies.
winaccent.author: Valer100
highlights: get light mode/dark mode/normal accent color or a shade of it
get a callback when the accent color is changed
